title: NEIGHBORHOOD REPORT: BROOKLYN UP CLOSE; Greenpoint to Sheepshead Bay: When the Boards Meet

body: FLUSHING Baa, Baa, Black Sheep, Let's Have That Wool Visitors to the Queens Wildlife Center today will notice that someone has taken the winter coats of some defenseless residents. The new silhouettes of the sheep (and some goats) will be on display as Sheep-Shearing Weekend continues. Children will be able to create lamb puppets, make buttons and
title: PLAYING IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD

body: FROM an 1811 farmhouse in Doylestown, Pa., to ocean-front gardens in Rye, N.Y., to a Park Avenue duplex, show houses and house and garden tours are preparing for visitors in the Northeast. title: Tour Time: Spring Becomes the Northeast
